comment: Service-based PCF with subscription economic model

pcf.boundaryProcessesDescription: Cloud infrastructure, data centers, software development, and customer support
pcf.exemptedEmissionsDescription: Office operations and employee commuting below materiality threshold

economic.additionalEconomicInformation: SaaS economic model with recurring revenue and scalable infrastructure costs

OPEX.description: Fixed costs include core infrastructure and development team. Variable costs per user for additional compute and storage

productPricing.priceValidityPeriod: Monthly subscription with annual commitment options
productPricing.volumeDiscountsStructure: Enterprise pricing starts at 100 users with 15% discount, custom pricing for 1000+ users
productPricing.description: Monthly SaaS subscription with tiered pricing for different organization sizes
